questList.questDescription: The Obsidian Fields are rife with the taint of abominable creatures. To pass through this desolate expanse, you must either eliminate or ally with Corrosus, Phantasmia, and Virulon. Their dark powers could either aid your cause or be obliterated to clear your path.

Forge an unholy alliance with Inferno, the Red Devil of the Hellish Horde. Convince him to join your dark crusade, and in return, you will gain the Amulet of Healing, a relic that can mend even the deepest wounds.

The Primordial Titans stand as an ancient force of nature, defying your malevolent will. Crush Granite, the Stone Golem, to shatter their resistance and claim the Amulet of Alliance, a token of your growing power.
The Withered Grove is haunted by the restless spirits of the Undead Legion. Overcome or ally with Rattle, Mourn, and Haunt to pass through this cursed forest and continue your dark journey.

Within the shadows of the Withered Grove lies the Serpentide Enclave. Convince Serpenta, the Naga Guardian, to join your ranks, and in return, receive the Amulet of Healing to sustain your dark crusade.

The Phantom Shadows lurk in the depths of the Withered Grove, their spectral forms a constant threat. Destroy Wisp, the Spectral Ghost, to dispel their haunting presence and claim the Amulet of Alliance.

The time has come to face Seraphiel the Benevolent, the legendary Peacemaker Angel. Defeat him and his Guardians to plunge the Shattered Realms of Dusk into eternal darkness and claim your ultimate victory.
Unite with Seraphel, the Ascended Dragon, to bolster your dark forces. Convince this legendary being to join your cause and gain the Amulet of Healing, a powerful artifact to sustain your strength.

The Relict Guardians stand as ancient protectors within the Sanctum of Shadows. Vanquish Anubis, the Ushabti, to weaken their defenses and claim the Amulet of Alliance, securing your dominion over the realm.
